title.rendered: Valutico wins SelectUSA Fintech pitching competition

content.rendered:
🇦🇹🏆👏 Proudly announcing the 2021 SelectUSA Tech Pitching winners – our very own Austrian start-ups Tonio – tone with information for E-Commerce and Valutico for FinTech! What tremendous successes against fierce competition from more than 2️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ start-up competitors worldwide.

Congratulations Florian Novak, Stephan Karner, and Paul Resch, CVA for your innovative solutions are clearly poised for success in the U.S. market! Kudos also to MOSTLY AI for 2nd place in the Software Pitch and Ribbon Biolabs for 3rd place in the MedTech II Pitch. Austria’s start-up dynamos are capturing global attention! 🚀

excerpt.rendered: 🇦🇹🏆👏 Proudly announcing the 2021 SelectUSA Tech Pitching winners – our very […]
